svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception_list Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception_list:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class represents the exception list for a transaction.

Member Function Documentation

  function void
 svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception_list::adjust_xact_reference
 (  svt_i2c_slave_transaction new_inst  ) 

The svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception class contains a reference, xact, to the transaction the exception is for. The exception_list copy leaves xact pointing to the 'original' transaction, not the copied into transaction. This function adjusts the xact reference in any transaction exceptions present.

new_inst - The svt_i2c_slave_transaction that this exception is associated with.

  function bit
 svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception_list::do_is_valid
 (  bit silent = 1, int kind = -1  ) 

Performs basic validation of the object contents. The only supported kind values are -1 and svt_sequence_item_base :: COMPLETE. Both values result in a COMPLETE compare.

  function bit
 svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception_list::has_exception
 (  svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception :: error_kind_enum error_kind  ) 

Searches the exception list of the transaction (if it has one), and returns a 1 if there are any exceptions of the specified type, or 0, if none were found.

error_kind - The kind of exception to look for.

Return values - Returns 1 if the transaction's exception list has at least one exception of the specified type (taking the specified values of affected_tx_packet and retry_number into account). Returns 0 if it does not, or if the exception list is null.

  function void
 svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception_list::new
 (  string name = "svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception_list_inst", svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception randomized_exception = null  ) 

CONSTRUCTOR: Create a new exception list instance, passing the appropriate argument values to the parent class.

name - Instance name of the instance

  function svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception_list
 svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception_list::remove_exceptions
 (  svt_i2c_slave_transaction_exception :: error_kind_enum error_kind  ) 

Searches the exception list of the transaction (if it has one), and removes any exceptions of the specified type.

error_kind - The kind of exception to remove.

Return values - Provides a handle to the updated exception list. This will be null if all of the exceptions have been removed or if the exception list was null when the function was called.
